title: Process Payment for Third-Party Booking
description: A guest checking out booked through a third-party website (e.g., Expedia) and needs to pay for incidental charges.

tasks.description: Retrieve the guest's folio and confirm that the room and tax were prepaid through the third party.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the main charges are covered and only incidentals are due.

tasks.description: Present the guest with the list of incidental charges (e.g., room service, parking).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the outstanding balance.

tasks.description: Collect payment from the guest for the incidental charges.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the payment and provides the guest with a zero-balance receipt.
